data.title: Engil México, S.A. de C.V. (Mota
data.meta_description: Mota-Engil México, S.A. de C.V., the Mexican unit of Portugal's largest construction company, Mota-Engil SGPS S.A., operates in the transport, port, logistics and waste management sectors. It was founded in 2010. In 2014, a consortium led by Mota-Engil won a t...
data.text:
Mota-Engil México, S.A. de C.V. (Mota-Engil México)

Get all the information about Mota-Engil México, S.A. de C.V. (Mota-Engil México), a company operating mainly in the Infrastructure sector. Connect with its key contacts, projects, shareholders, related news and more. The company has operations in Mexico, which include Construction Contractor Company. Write to us at info@bnamericas.com or call us at +56 (2) 29410300 to schedule a demonstration of our platform.
